DOC.brief_summary: Exploratory, international, multi-centre, randomized, investigator blinded study in acne
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study to Investigate Filiation Between Primary and Secondary Lesions in Acne Patients
DOC.criteria: Male or female subjects aged 18 to 35 years inclusive Subjects with active, moderate acne The subject has a secondary acne form (chloracne, druginduced acne, etc.) (Screening) The subject has a severity of acne that is not amenable to treatment with CD0271CD1579 (Screening)
